subject: Re: initial test version of CTDB clustered Samba available
body:
has smbtorture been modified anywhere to use different nodes for
the multiple client connections?

tridge@samba.org wrote:
> Volker,
> 
>  > Tridge, you might want to merge an incomplete initial
>  > traverse client from my 3_0 tree. I don't get any replies...
> 
> thanks. I've fixed it up, and now traverse works fine. This also gets
> smbstatus working. Please review my commits, especially the changes to
> ctdbd_socket_readable()
> 
> Cheers, Tridge
